Articles.Content: I join the hill empire with a space center on a hill! Space shuttles armed with orbital bombardment weapons are launched to polar orbits, while hundreds of tiny drone stealth fighters sit guard!
By this point the Hill Empire has settlements on every hill on kerbin, so it's time go to space.
Through a political coup, I take over every hill on Kerbin and establish myself as a dictator.

Still have my mountain! I use a flight group of Star- Dreadnoughts to escape to Eve before Kerbin is destroyed in a civil war.
The last remnant of the Hill Empire prepares to retake the motherland. Soon the sky will be streaked with plasma trails from de-orbiting dropships.
Yes, send your dropships. I'd like to see them get past my SPACE NINJAS! Through brute force, I regain control of Kerbin, establishing Hill Forts all across the planet.
Through space shuttles that launch orbital bases and launch micro drone fighters all over the world, I destroy your hill forts and space ninjas, freeing the planet in one epic battle!

No.

Stop.

*Hammertime*.

In the middle of the chaos, I establish a hill. Along with a self destruct mechanism with the ability to incinerate Kerbin's atmosphere if compromised.

My hill with a doomsday self destruct device.

I de- orbit my nuclear- missile armed star Dreadnoughts and start blasting away at the Enemies of the Motherland.

THIS. IS. HILLEMPIIIIIRRRRRREEE!

Reset.

No... Dude... Just... Please stop this.

You may think you've taken the hills... but you do not have The Hill. Think about it. This whole kerfuffle started over one hill, and devolved into a war for every hill, slope, ridge, dune, bluff, cliff, promontory, headland, stack, ascent, gradient, precipice, knoll, protuberance, drift, fell, heap, mesa, mound, eminence, acclivity, incline, mount, shock, prominence, range, summit, highland, talus, upland, butte, hummock, tor, and esker on this Gaben-forsaken planet.

But tou have forgotten The Hill. The cause of this conflict. As we speak, I've constructed a massive fortress atop it, protecting it from the unworthy. My legions of trained soldiers, artillery, weapons of mass destruction, and fortifications protect this sacred place. I have been crowned ruler of this mighty hill, ruling with an iron fist.

I am truly the King of The Hill.

Massive fortress sinks in ground. With legions.

Archaeologists' hill.
I am in a mountain!

When my fortress sank into the ground, The Hill did as well.

My fortified underground Hill.

#spawn creeper 1000  

#spawn zombie 1000  

#spawn skeleton 1000

I use my shuttles to deorbit 500 class E asteroids on top of The Hill. Once the base was destroyed, I land and claim the hill, and establish 10,000 fighters to defend from any non orbital bombardment attack, and have my shuttles ready to defend from orbital bombardment

An old ~~white haired~~ bald guy wearing orange robe comes to your hill and beats your 10000 fighters one by one thanks to his secret kung-fu style of Sabre-Tooth Jerboa, and even hasn't gotten tired.  

(In fact they rarely count something less than in millions, so 10000 is just a penny compared to dollar for him).

His ~~girlfriend~~ equitable companion from a friendly martial sorority gathers all your shuttles and begins weaving.

None of them give a snack what are those "orbital", "bombardment" and "asteroid" words.  

Try to explain them that this is your hill.

I use the video footage from the attacks on the fighters to build new ones that are programmed to recognize him and his companion and adapt to counter their fighting styles. I build 10,000,000 of them and have them attack all at once. 

My hill armed with 8,000,000 drone fighters.

I push you off the hill.

My hill with 8 million drones

I walk back on. 

Our hill with 8,000,000 drones
Drones got a virus. They are immobilized.
